<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103231</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103231</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087692</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Report on the Educational Use of Games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berichten Sie über den pädagogischen Gebrauch 
von Spielen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rendez compte de l'utilisation éducative des 
jeux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relate no uso educacional dos jogos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali sull'uso educativo dei giochi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκθεση σχετικά με την εκπαιδευτική χρήση των 
παιχνιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señale sobre el uso educativo de juegos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This 48 page report details the findings of an investigation by TEEM into the educational benefits of games in education.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser 48 Seite Report schildert die Entdeckungen 
einer Untersuchung AUSGIESSEN vorbei in den pädagogischen Nutzen der 
Spiele in der Ausbildung genau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet état de 48 pages détaille les résultats 
d'une recherche COULENT près dans les avantages éducatifs des jeux 
dans l'éducation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este relatório de 48 páginas detalha os findings
de uma investigação TEEM perto nos benefícios educacionais dos 
jogos na instrução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo rapporto delle 48 pagine dettaglia i 
risultati di una ricerca vicino COLA nei benefici educativi dei giochi
nella formazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η έκθεση 48 σελίδων απαριθμεί τα συμπεράσματα
μιας έρευνας από TEEM σχετικά με τα εκπαιδευτικά οφέλη των 
παιχνιδιών στην εκπαίδευση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este informe de 48 paginaciones detalla los 
resultados de una investigación cerca VIERTE en las ventajas 
educativas de juegos en la educación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ANGELA MCFARLANE, ANNE SPARROWHAWK, YSANNE HEALD
FN:ANGELA MCFARLANE, ANNE SPARROWHAWK, YSANNE HEALD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087692</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103231</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/report-on-the-educational-use-of-games</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
